Enhance your gameplay with an all new stop type! Now trams, buses and trolleys can share the same stop, making it even easier for passengers to change vehicles. The set includes a smaller stop for less crowded routes, and a large one to handle lots of traffic.
A welcome addition to your bus fleet, the Stern-Berger Majora is a new bus model that will bring a new boost to your game. An excellent vehicle for inner-city routes!
Trolleys are an excellent way to use electricity instead of expensive diesel. This pack brings you a new trolleys model with top notch performance and a new, modern design.

A new tram in two variations. A larger version for crowded routes to handle masses of passengers, and a smaller version to save in fuel costs, so you won't be paying to move a half-empty tram. Both are sleek, modern models with excellent stats to give you an extra boost to your game.
Surf the waves! The all new Donau Leaper is a smart little boat that offers lots of new options for building water bus lines.
Do you have a line with hard to please customers? The Pavlov Arriva is small, smart and very comfortable to ride. Passengers are sure to flock to this one!
The Comet Sun is pretty average in every way. True, that's not the best of slogans, but the Sun is a well-rounded vehicle with notable capacity and speed. Decent for almost any route!

When your maintenance capacity is under a lot of stress, the Maurice Automaton is the vehicle to choose. It has a sturdy structure and a low maintenance need, making it perfect for busy inner city routes with short intervals.
Need more capacity? The Arnauls 202 has lots of room and then some! It's very slow, but with the large capacity still very useful for routes with lots of passengers.

Not many passengers fit into a Stern-Berger ProTerra, but its energy consumption is so low it basically runs on air! This small but powerful vehicle is the top of the line when it comes to eco-friendly inventions.

Want more buses? Look no further! The Bus Mania pack offers five all-new bus vehicles to spice up the game. Use these modern vehicles to make the most of your existing routes, or build all new lines for these impressive new vehicles, and the citizens will stand and marvel!
The Bergstrom Lyon is slow but carries a lot of passengers, and doesn't consume a lot of energy. This fancy tram will be the talk of the town!

When you need a tram that's eco-friendly, go for the Scanditram Master. Its unusual, futuristic look is sure to have your customers interested and it sure will make people jealous. -- It's not called a Master for nothing!
Low energy consumption and high attractiveness are the Louis Qatar's best qualities. Simply put, it's small, sleek and very nice!
Livingstone SC is the way to go when you want your passengers to be as comfortable as possible, but not at a cost to environment.
When you need speed, look no further than the Scanditram Universe! This fast, small vehicle is built super sleek and almost requires no maintenance.

Trams are truly the salt of the earth. The Tram Tremors pack offers five new trams, each more impressive than the last. Decorate your city streets with new, shiny, modern trams of all shapes and sizes!
It may appear a bit clunky, but don't let looks deceive you! The Trooper has superb capacity, and will tirelessly work any route you assign it.

The catamaran hull of the Toyoka 350 might look a bit old fashioned, but underneath the surface there's plenty of room for passengers. Though it does not excel in other areas, the 350 is an ideal choice when capacity is your chief concern.
This fine futuristic vessel is the answer to all your needs. Though it's very fast, it does not consume much energy, making it a perfect match for those busy but eco-friendly passengers.
While the Ciapada does consume relatively high amounts of fuel, even on short runs, it's a well-rounded vessel and is quite fast and comfortable. It's a fine vehicle for most routes!

The Stingray Peter is a must if you aim to please those demanding passengers who prize comfort above all else. It's very well designed, with the passenger's comfort always in mind, and barely needs any maintenance. Add to this its impressive speed, and who can doubt that this is the finest craft on the waves!

Populate the waters in your city with brand new vessels! Five new waterbuses offer both speed and capacity, and will surely have your passengers pointing and staring in awe as they launch from your depots.

It's a bit slow and requires a fair bit of maintenance, but the TransLink boasts unsurpassed capacity. Due to its slow pace, the vehicle will perform best on routes with many stops and only short distances between them.

The Guide is the pride of the Stern-Berger factories. While it isn't the fastest vehicle available, its special padded seats make it very comfortable for passengers, making it highly attractive to your passengers.

The Iris is a well-rounded vehicle that performs well on most routes. Its moves at a reasonable speed, and has a fine capacity. It requires regular maintenance, but overall it is a fine, mid-line vehicle, with adequate performance through and through.

It you require a highly reliable vehicle that also has a high average speed, the Comet BussCar is the one for you. Its capacity is quite low, and it isn't the most comfortable vehicle in the world, but in all other areas it performs wonderfully.
The OB is a small, fast vehicle perfect for long routes to remote locations. It performs particularly well on long distances thanks to its speed and sturdiness.

Everything is trolleys! This pack offers five new trolleys to liven up your streets. Whether you're looking for speed, capacity, or low maintenance requirements, there's a vehicle here that fits the bill.

The FL9 is a hot new model, fresh from the Crescenta factories -- an instant classic. It offers your passengers a very comfortable ride, and boasts superior capacity. It isn't the fastest vehicle known to man, but performs its duties diligently. It carries such large numbers of passengers that it's really at its best on congested inner city routes.
The Madressa may be slow, but this is the cost of excellent energy efficiency and high capacity. This modern vehicle performs well on busy routes.

Distinguished by peculiar angles and an otherworldly appearance, the new EcoBoost is true to its name -- as it is constructed entirely from recycled materials! The Capitol factories sought something altogether new and eco-friendly, and from this inspiration build an entirely new metro train. The surprising and unique look has already proven very attractive to passengers.

Extra wide seating makes the Rocket a superbly comfortable ride. It's also quite sturdy so it requires little maintenance, and it doesn't consume much energy either. The only downside is its low speed. Comfort comes at a price!

The Metropolis, true to its name, was designed for great, bustling cities. It barely requires any maintenance, thanks to its solid build, and is highly energy efficient. All of this, combined with a high average speed, makes it an excellent vehicle to place on inner city routes which remain busy throughout the day.

Ever wanted a shorter metro for use at night, and a much longer version for rush hour? Well, now it's finally possible! The Metro Madness pack features customizable metro units that you assemble car by car, thus enabling you to easily alter the setup for different timetables. It also boasts five brand new metro trains -- each with three different cars!
Ce monument a déjà été construit !
Cannot place more landmarks in a single city!
Transport {2} passengers to unlock another landmark!\n{3} / {2} passengers transported

Give your citizens a new place to go with this grand landmark! Petronas towers will surely make your city seem brand new. Two huge towers connected with a bridge are sleek, shiny and gorgeous, a great addition to any city. Landmarks are a way to show how well your city is doing -- and they are always popular locations, so a line going to a landmark is always likely to be profitable.

Do your citizens thirst some classical music? Of course they do -- and why shouldn't they? An Opera House is a fine addition to any city. Such a landmark, with its perfect, organic arches, is sure to draw great crowds, and will always be a profitable transport location.

What city could not be improved by a vast luxury hotel? The Burj Al-Arab skyscraper is modern, sophisticated, and exquisitely luxurious, and will surely be very popular with your citizens. Such a landmark always attracts interest, so any line going to it will be frequented by many citizens.
The number one symbol of Germany, the Brandenburg Gate, is a very popular destination in any city. Place it in your city and it will surely draw a crowd!
The gothic elegance of the Cologne Cathedral is unsurpassed. Place this landmark in your city, and watch as the masses flock to it.
Sleek, modern and gherkin-like, this landmark promises to be one of the busiest places in town. Building a line to it will always bring you profit!
The seat of royalty, Buckingham Palace, is quite dignified and stately, and a classic tourist destination. Your citizens will love to go there to ogle the magnificent structure!
The Rathause is a sublime sight, and is sure to draw lots of people. You should definitely build some lines going to it!
Elizabeth Tower houses the huge bell famously known as Big Ben. It's all a part of Westminster Palace, and a sure place to attract lots of citizens on sunny days.
Monorail stop with ticket machine and lighting

Marvellous Monorails offers an all-new vehicle type to Cities in Motion 2. The monorail is a handy vehicle for innercity connections and works best in circular lines. The pack boasts five different monorail vehicles, from the slow but very large Toyoka Cybria City, to the super-fast but quite high maintenance Stern-Berger Mate.

Feeling nostalgia for the first Cities in Motion? Now you can enjoy the old European style in Cities in Motion 2, too! The European Metropolis set features 34 new buildings to give your dynamic cities the feel of classical Europe.

How are you? I'm Annie Martins, a hotel entrepreneur. Tourism is an important part of the economy of our city. Make sure that all our citizens are well connected, and the city grows and stays interesting for our tourists.
Thank you! Tourism here is a great success. Keep up the good work!
Hello, I'd like to ask a bit of a favor. My friends and I thought we might do a little sightseeing. We would really love to have new tourist lines. I'm sure that would make you a ton of money!
Great, the tourists really love your company!
A fine city you have here! Listen, I'm visiting here for a while and I'd love to go shopping, but I can't find a line that will take me where I was planning to go. Maybe you could build one?
Wow, quick work! That's really impressive! I'll check it out as soon as I can!
Nice to meet you. I'm Ellie, from the tourist bureau. We've been receiving feedback that the public transportation vehicles are not modern enough. Maybe we should buy new ones!
Thanks! Now the city is an even nicer place to travel!
Hello, my name is Jonas. I really love busses! There is no better way to travel to work. How many people you can transport by bus?
Cool, you have some very popular bus lines in the city!
Hi, I'm Lisa and I love trams and metros. It would be wonderful if our city had more of them. Do you think you could build more tram and metro lines?
Excellent, now I don't have to use busses any more!
Hi! Did you know that tourists love water buses? Build a new water bus line!
Nice work, the tourist office is really happy with your company.
Hello. As you may know, tourists bring lots of jobs to the city. Could you connect the tourists with the local companies?
Good work, the tourists love the city!
Hi, have you noticed that competition is fierce in today's economy? Keep up with the competition!
Wow, you really are something! Good luck for the future!

Hello there! I'm Anna and I really love living on the island, but public transportation is not so great around here. I need to visit my mother in the hospital. Could you please connect me to the mainland?
Thank you very much! This really makes my life easier!
Good job! The tourists love the city!

Hi, I'm Jonathan! I've lived my whole life far from the city center, but I'm getting old and I need the city services more and more. But I really don't want to move out of my childhood home! Could you help me and the other elderly? We need good connections!
I never thought you would listen to the old people! Thank you, all my friends are grateful. Now the grandchildren can visit us more often.

Hello there. My name is Sam, and I'm the CEO of the leading grocery company around here. We just opened a new hypermarket and it would be just great if you could make a route for our factory. I hope you can help!
Thank you! Now our employees can use the public transportation!
Good day! I'm Jon and I really don't understand all the excitement about metros. A bus is a cheap option, and you don't have to travel under ground!
Cool, I'm glad you appreciate the buses too.
Hello, I'm Lena! We have almost everything we need around here, but I would really love to visit the theater more often. Could you build a better connection to the theater?
Wow, now my husband will have to take me to the new play!
Jack from your PR department here, hello. Now I don't want to tell you how to do your job, but could you try making our lives a little bit easier by improving the company's reputation? Thanks!
Well done! Our company is looking very good to the outside world!

Hey dude, how's it going? My name's Rick, and I got a hot tip for you: water buses! Everybody loves them and we're not short on water around here. Also, there aren't enough trams in the city. I suggest you get to work and build some new lines!
Sweet dude, now you see my idea was excellent!
Hey there! Keep your city connected! The people are being forced to use their own cars!
Nice work! The public transportation improves the traffic conditions, and it's cheaper for our citizens than driving.
Hello, I came to check how you are doing! Show me how your company is working!
Cool! Your company is working like a charm!
Hi! I'm Helen, a gym teacher. I would really love to take my students swimming, but the swimming hall is too far to walk. Could you help us?
Thank you! Everybody is so excited to go swimming!
Hey! You there! Listen up, young man... I want to get to my favorite shop since they have the cheapest potatoes in town. How about you put a line there!
It's about time! I do hope the potatoes are still on sale!
I have to admit that you young people can get things done. We pensioners are grateful!

Good day to you! I'm Olof Jung, the mayor of the city. We are so glad to have you here! Our city is a business and financial center, but we cannot keep up with the competition without a public transport system. Indeed, our citizens have been clamoring for it! For me, the most important thing is to keep the citizens happy. You may get to work immediately!
Excellent work, our business is growing! Let's see what else we can achieve together.

Hello, my name is Franz and I'm the CEO of the leading telecommunications company in these parts. We've just opened a new office and it would be great if you could add a route that connects it to my home. Any form of transport would be fine. I do hope you can help!
Thank you! Now I can leave my car at home.
Hello, my name is Sandra and I work at the museum. We have a new exhibit and we hope to get a lot of visitors. Please try to transport 50 tourists to the museum.
Excellent! The visitors really loved the exhibit!
Hello! I work in a factory and I would love to have a line connecting my home to the workplace. I hope you can help me!
Thank you! The new line is working so well!
Hey you! It's the PR department again... We would really appreciate if you could raise the company reputation.
Thank you! You really made our day!
Hi! I'm performing a study of the city's public transportation. I need to interview 500 customers! I just need you to transport them.
Thanks, I'll let your PR department know the results!
Hey! I'm Joe from your financial department. We really need to save some money!
Good job, now we are in balance again!
Good day! Have you noticed the city areas along the coast of the river? Connect them!
Good job! The route is now much shorter compared to the roads.
Hi! I need a line which connects my home, workplace, and the grocery store. Visiting the shop after work will be so much easier if you could build a line!
Thank you! This really helps a lot!
Hi, how are you? Show the investors that your company is doing well!
Nice work, the investors are really convinced!
Marvelous job! Our city is growing!
Hello there! Business has been growing and the companies need more workers in all fields. The employers need your help!
Thank you so much for helping out! We will take good care of the company you set up, and send you the profit it makes every month.
Show us what you've got! Transport the workers!
Good job! I'm excited to see what else you can do for the city.
I've heard some unkind rumors about your company! You should do something about your reputation!
That's better! Now my friends are recommending all your services.
Good day! You have too few vehicles! Buy new ones!
Great! Now the customers are much happier.
Hi there! I need new workers for the shopping center. Could you build a line from the housing area so my workers can get here easier?
Thank you! Now I've received plenty of new job applications!
Hello, I'm Susan and I have to take my kids to school every morning. Could you build a tram line to the school?
Excellent, this really has made my mornings easier!
I really think the metro is the most efficient form of public transportation. You should consider building a new metro line!
See? The people just love it.
Hello! Have you completely forgotten me and other pensioners? Build lines for us!
About time that you do something for us!
I think your trams are getting old. You really should buy new ones!
Cool, now I'm excited to travel again.
The office buildings need better connections. You should make sure that the white collar workers are happy with your services!
Good job! The city's economy is doing well!
Awesome work! The city is really full of workers now!

Good day! I'm Alexandr and I work as a traffic engineer. Our city is over 1000 years old and boasts a long history of public transportation. We have one of the highest public transportation rates of any city, but our transportation infrastructure is growing out-dated. Help keep us modern -- and keep the citizens moving!
Marvelous work! Our public transportation is doing better than ever!
I love trolley buses! Our city should have more of them. Could you do something about that?
Wow, I always prefer the trolley bus over other vehicles, when I have the choice!
Culture is important! Make sure that the citizens have a chance to enjoy the museum!
Nice, I bet people are happy with the new line.
Remember the outskirts! Try building couple of lines out past the main city lines!
Good job! The people are happy!
There still isn't a line between my home and workplace. I work at the nuclear plant. Could you build the line? I prefer the trolley buses, by the way.
Thank you! Now I won't have to move.
Hello, how are you doing? I'm Bohdan, the chef of the restaurant. Could you build a trolley line to the restaurant? I'm sure it would bring in a lot of new customers.
Thank you very much! All the tables are reserved and the restaurant is busy!
Hi, I'm Anna and I would love to enjoy sightseeing in the city. Could you build a line that would take me to the art gallery, museum, and park?
Thank you! Now I can really enjoy my holiday.
There's no growing economy without good education! Make sure the students are well connected!
Good job! The students are using your services.
The growing economy needs more workers!

Hello! We really need to be able to move products from our manufacturing plant to several locations -- all at a constant rate. Your trolley buses would be ideal. I hope you can build new trolley lines for us!
Thank you very much! Our factory is more efficient now.
Bon travail ! Notre économie est florissante !

Bonjour, comment allez-vous mon ami ? Je me présente, Ctibor Bosko, le maire de cette ville. La structure économique de la ville est aujourd'hui tournée vers les services alors continuez de faire grandir votre entreprise !
Bien joué, votre entreprise prospère ! Voilà ce dont notre économie a besoin !
De bons moyens de transport se sont avant tout de bons véhicules. Jetez donc un oeil aux nouveaux disponibles !
Bons choix ! N'oubliez pas de bien les entretenir.
Toute entreprise a besoin de bonnes relations publiques. Vous devriez vous y mettre !
Bravo ! Vos clients s'intéressent à vos services.
Bonjour, je m'appelle Sandra et j'aimerais beaucoup aller voir mes grands-parents ! Pouvez-vous m'aider en créant une ligne de transport entre ma maison et la leur ?
Merci beaucoup ! Mes grands-parents étaient très heureux de me voir !
Toute grande ville a besoin de trams !
Excellent travail ! Voilà une ville moderne !

Bonjour, je suis Tomas et je pense que la ville n'a pas assez de trolleybus. Vous devriez créer une ligne qui relie les bureaux ! Vous devriez aussi en créer une entre l'église et la zone résidentielle. Et puis une dernière entre le café et la gallerie d'art, si ce n'est pas trop demandé.
Génial ! Je n'imaginais pas que vous alliez répondre à mes demandes ! Je vais recommander votre entreprise à tous mes amis !
Salut ! J'aimerais bien aller au cinéma après l'école mais il n'y a aucune ligne qui y va. Pouvez-vous faire quelque chose ?
Merci, je vais pouvoir aller au cinéma plus souvent.
Bonjour, comment allez-vous ? Je pense que cette ville manque de lignes de métro. Construisez-en une au départ du musée !
Excellent travail ! Je vais pouvoir utiliser cette ligne tous les jours !
Les transports publics s'améliorent mais il y a toujours des zones non-connectées. Construisez cinq nouvelles lignes pour les connecter !
Cool ! Bientôt, plus personne n'aura besoin de voitures !
En combien de temps pouvez-vous transporter 1000 passagers ? Montrez-moi !
Bien joué ! Vous avez une entreprise efficace !
Merci pour votre aide ! La ville est animée et moderne !
